headline: Piper Sandler Affirms ‘Overweight’ Rating on Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP)
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (NASDAQ:KDP) is one of the 12 best consumer goods stocks billionaires are quietly buying. On June 30, Piper Sandler reiterated an ‘Overweight’ rating and $40 price target. The research firm maintains a bullish stance on improved conditions in the company’s US coffee segment. Additionally, Piper Sandler is impressed by the continued […]
